title: Customer Onboarding Process
objectives: Successfully onboard new customers ensuring they have access to all required systems and understand the product basics. By the end of this process, the customer should be able to use the core features independently.
prerequisites:
- Admin access to Customer Portal
- Access to email system
- Customer's signed contract
- Welcome email template

steps.title: Verify Contract and Customer Details
steps.content:
1. Log into the Customer Portal
2. Navigate to **Pending Onboardings**
3. Locate the customer's entry and verify:
   - Contract is signed and dated
   - Contact email is valid
   - Subscription tier matches the contract

steps.title: Create Customer Account
steps.content:
1. Click **Create Account** in the customer's entry
2. Fill in the required fields:
   - Company name
   - Primary contact email
   - Subscription tier
3. Click **Save and Send Invitation**

> Note: The system will automatically send a welcome email with login credentials.

steps.title: Schedule Kickoff Call
steps.content:
1. Send calendar invite to customer's primary contact
2. Include:
   - Video conference link
   - Agenda document
   - Any pre-call preparation items
3. Set reminder for 24 hours before the call

steps.title: Conduct Kickoff and Training
steps.content:
During the kickoff call:

1. Introduce the team
2. Walk through the product dashboard
3. Demonstrate core features:
   - Feature A: Basic usage
   - Feature B: Configuration options
   - Feature C: Reporting
4. Answer questions
5. Share training resources link

steps.title: Follow Up and Close Onboarding
steps.content:
Within 48 hours after the kickoff:

1. Send follow-up email with:
   - Recording of the call (if applicable)
   - Links to documentation
   - Support contact information
2. Update customer status to **Active** in the portal
3. Schedule 30-day check-in call
